alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Cherokee; Gordon; Pickens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 2:14PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Cherokee, southeastern Gordon, Pickens and northeastern Bartow Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 214 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Salacoa Valley, or 11 miles west of Jasper, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Canton, Cartersville, Jasper, Ball Ground, Nelson, White, Waleska, Talking Rock, Fairmount, Ranger, Sonoraville, Lake Arrowhead, Folsom, Salacoa Valley, Pine Log, Blaine, Talmadge, Sutallee, Tate, and Funkhouser. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
